title: Campus Connect
shortDescription: MERN stack application to enhance campus communication and academic management.
longDescription: Developed CampusConnect using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to streamline campus communication. Implemented role-based access control with JWT, real-time attendance tracking, and exam results management. Focused on secure authentication, clear UX for admin/students/faculty, and scalable APIs.

title: Nutri Guide
shortDescription: AI-powered meal planner and nutrition analytics web app.
longDescription: Engineered NutriGuide, a full-stack AI web app generating personalized meal plans using Gemini API for natural language understanding. Implemented dynamic meal scheduling with macro breakdowns, Chart.js visual analytics, and JWT-based authentication. Built Mindful Eating Score, Food Doctor, and AI-generated recipes with timers and macro charts.

images.alt: Nutri Guide dashboard showing macro chart

title: FakeBuster
shortDescription: Full-stack multi-modal deepfake detection platform (video, image, audio).
longDescription: Built FakeBuster using React, TypeScript, FastAPI, and Python ML models to detect deepfakes across video, image and audio. Implemented a multi-modal pipeline: XceptionNet (video), Vision Transformer + CLIP (image), and RawNet2 + Wav2Vec2.0 (audio). Created a responsive dashboard with drag-and-drop uploads, heatmaps, spectrograms, confidence gauges, and sub-5-second media processing in optimized environment.

images.alt: FakeBuster interface showing spectrogram and confidence gauge
